Messeger to Hell Beast

The Bat-prob started to fly around the ship where Hell Beast was. In 
order to caught his atention, it started to shot its smaller lasser 
but it was careful to didn't hurt ship's shell...

___________________________________________


The Probe

A hard movement of Wheelljack, did that probe dropped out its 
autodestruction program.

Soon all probe was trowing smoke, all cisruits were burned  - except 
the tiny cd that contains the menssage.
